subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: Sage Kotsenburg of Park City, Utah, was a surprise winner in snowboard slopestyle, as the event made its Olympic debut. The favorite, Mark McMorris of Canada, finished third.
snippet: Sage Kotsenburg of Park City, Utah, was a surprise winner in snowboard slopestyle, as the event made its Olympic debut. The favorite, Mark McMorris of Canada, finished third.
